name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 18 – Egg Boat

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this week’s show we talk about lying to your spouse about egg skills, being lucky on the job search, and living on boats. We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Cast of Thrones. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
